telecom.server.leakyBucket

Class Bucket

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.AbstractSequentialList<E>
          • java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Byte>
            • telecom.server.leakyBucket.Bucket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Byte>, java.util.Collection<java.lang.Byte>, java.util.Deque<java.lang.Byte>, java.util.List<java.lang.Byte>, java.util.Queue<java.lang.Byte>

    public class Bucket
extends java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Byte>
    Implement Bucket data structure using LinkedList of Bytes, represented as a Queue of Bytes where fills from end of queue and leaks from the head of queue(FIFO).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean fill(byte[] packet)
      Fills the bucket with a data packet, and will discard additional packet if bucket is full during filling.
      int getBucketSize() 
      byte[] leak()
      Leaks the data inside the bucket at 1/10 of constant rate defined as leakRate when the bucket is created.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bucket

        public Bucket(int size,
      int leakRate)
        Initialize the bucket with bucket size and leak rate.
        Parameters:
        size - Size of the bucket in Byte.
        leakRate - Rate at which this bucket leaks, in Bytes/s.

    • Method Detail

      • fill

        public boolean fill(byte[] packet)
        Fills the bucket with a data packet, and will discard additional packet if bucket is full during filling.
        Parameters:
        packet - Data packet to be added to the bucket.
        Returns:
        true if all packet is added to the bucket, false otherwise.

      • leak

        public byte[] leak()
        Leaks the data inside the bucket at 1/10 of constant rate defined as leakRate when the bucket is created.
        Returns:
        data packet leaked from the bucket.

      • getBucketSize

        public int getBucketSize()
